name: Heatwave (Monochromesoft)
description:
A fast paced fighting game set in the post apocalypse!

Set many years after the most of the Earth was made uninhabitable by an apocalyptic heatwave! Fight using powerful special moves and assists, and counterattack using the parry system!

This an EARLY ACCESS version of the game, there might be bugs, or unfinished features so please be patient!

[Features!]

  • 11 Characters.
  • 15 Assists.
  • 12 Stages.
  • Training Mode.
  • Versus Mode.
  • Written Tutorial.
  • Gallery Mode.
  • 1(one) Secret Thing

[Features to be added! At no extra Cost!]

  • More Characters...
  • More Assists.
  • More stages.
  • Arcade mode.
  • Interactive Tutorial.
  • Combo Challenges.
  • More Secret Things ;)

[Default Keyboard Controls]

  • WASD = Movement
  • U = A Button
  • I = B Button
  • K = C Button/Cancel
  • J = D Button/Confirm
  • O = Support Button
  • L = B+C (Burst)
  • P = A+D (Throw)
  • M = A+B (Button Dash)
  • Tab = Start/Pause

If you find any bugs please report them on Heatwave's Discord: https://discord.gg/GKRus2HFB

If you ever need to reset the game's settings completely, hold left shift, and press Z while on the Title Screen this will delete the save files, and close the game.
